<title level="1" right="Action">[Liberating Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=2808) <actions string="Reaction" /></title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 92 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Trigger** An enemy damages, grabs, or restrains your ally, and both are in your champion’s aura

</column>

---

You free an ally from restraint. If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. The ally can attempt to break free of effects [grabbing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=77), [restraining](/Conditions.aspx?ID=90), [immobilizing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=81), or [paralyzing](/Conditions.aspx?ID=85) them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to Escape from one effect as a free action. Whether or not it needed to escape, the ally can then Step as a free action if it's able to move.
name: Liberating Step

If the trigger was an ally taking damage, the ally gains resistance to all damage against the triggering damage equal to 2 + your level. The ally can attempt to break free of effects grabbing, restraining, immobilizing, or paralyzing them. They either attempt a new save against one such effect that allows a save, or attempt to Escape from one effect as a free action. Whether or not it needed to escape, the ally can then Step as a free action if it's able to move.
